recommended_action:
1. Go to Network Watcher
2. Right click on the subscription name and click on Enable network watcher in all regions
rationale: Network diagnostic and visualization tools available with Network Watcher help users understand, diagnose, and gain insights to the network in Azure.

provisioningState.errorMessage: Network watcher is not enabled in this region.

properties.errorMessage: Network watcher is not enabled in this region.
